name: Sensitive Stylo Lipstick - N 05: 8-Hour Wear for Sensitive Lips | Hypoallergenic
description:
Sensitive Stylo Lipstick - N 05: Luxurious Color with Skin-Friendly Formula

The Sensitive Stylo Lipstick - N 05 offers a perfect balance of vibrant color and gentle care for your lips. This premium lipstick is specially formulated for those with sensitive skin, providing stunning color without irritation. 💋

With its creamy texture and smooth application, the Sensitive Stylo Lipstick - N 05 glides effortlessly onto your lips, delivering rich pigmentation in a single stroke. The elegant shade N 05 presents a versatile color that complements various skin tones and occasions, from everyday wear to special events.

Product Information

Product Type Lipstick
Shade N 05
Formulation Sensitive Skin Formula
Finish Satin
Size 3.5g

Key Features of Sensitive Stylo Lipstick - N 05

  • Hypoallergenic Formula: Designed specifically for sensitive lips and tested to minimize allergic reactions ✅
  • Long-lasting Wear: Enjoy up to 8 hours of beautiful color without frequent touch-ups
  • Moisturizing Properties: Enriched with vitamin E and natural oils to keep lips hydrated 💦
  • Fragrance-Free: Perfect for those sensitive to scents
  • Dermatologically Tested: Proven safe for sensitive skin types

The Perfect Shade for Every Occasion

The Sensitive Stylo Lipstick - N 05 offers a sophisticated color that transitions beautifully from day to night. Whether you're heading to the office, enjoying a casual lunch, or attending an elegant evening event, this versatile shade enhances your natural beauty while providing the comfort your sensitive lips deserve.

Looking for other shades in our sensitive collection? Check out our Sensitive Stylo Lipstick - N 03 for a more subtle look, the Sensitive Stylo Lipstick - N 07 for a bolder statement, or our Sensitive Makeup Remover to gently cleanse your lips at the end of the day.

Frequently Asked Question

How is Sensitive Stylo Lipstick different from regular lipsticks?

The Sensitive Stylo Lipstick - N 05 is specifically formulated without common irritants found in regular lipsticks. It excludes parabens, synthetic fragrances, and harsh preservatives that can trigger reactions in sensitive skin. Additionally, it contains soothing ingredients like aloe vera and chamomile extract to calm and protect delicate lip tissue while providing beautiful, long-lasting color. 🌿
short_description: Experience gentle luxury with Sensitive Stylo Lipstick - N 05. This hypoallergenic formula delivers rich, long-lasting color while soothing sensitive lips with nourishing ingredients. Perfect for everyday elegance without irritation.
